summary: The film is named after the local football stadium located in the town of Be'er Sheva in southern Israel. Vasermil tells the story of three teenagers who live in the same tough neighborhood... See full summary »
cast: Avinoam Blumenkrantz|Benni Adega|Edna Fanta|Oksana Sokol|Rachel Melesa|Hani Peretz|Kobi Maor|Irit Nathan Benedek|Yaniv Adani|Dana Kucherovsky|Meir Simo|Sergei Gnatyuk|Oleg Chernishev|Oren Cohen|Kye Korabelnikov|Shirli Chernishev|Gal Fatachov|Avi Meir|Daniel Ben Shabat|Meir Levi|Nadir Eldad|David Taplitzky|Adiel Zamro
title: Vasermil
